mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUBMITTED_ASSIGNMENT WHERE SU_MOTHER_NO IS NULL AND AS_NO = #{asNo} AND SU_STATUS = 1

SELECT S.SU_NO, S.MB_NO, S.AS_NO, S.SU_MOTHER_NO, S.SU_INSERTDATE, S.SU_CONTENTS, S.SU_STATUS, M.MB_NICKNAME, M.MB_PHOTO FROM SUBMITTED_ASSIGNMENT S
JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MB_NO = M.MB_NO
WHERE S.SU_MOTHER_NO IS NULL AND S.AS_NO = #{asNo} AND S.SU_STATUS != 0 ORDER BY S.SU_NO DESC

SELECT SU_NO, MB_NO, AS_NO, SU_MOTHER_NO, SU_INSERTDATE, SU_CONTENTS, SU_STATUS, M.MB_NICKNAME, M.MB_PHOTO FROM (SELECT * FROM SUBMITTED_ASSIGNMENT WHERE SU_MOTHER_NO = #{suMotherNo} AND SU_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY SU_NO DESC)
JOIN MEMBER M USING(MB_NO)
WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT S.SU_NO, S.MB_NO, S.AS_NO, S.SU_MOTHER_NO, S.SU_INSERTDATE, S.SU_CONTENTS, M.MB_NICKNAME, M.MB_PHOTO FROM SUBMITTED_ASSIGNMENT S
JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MB_NO = M.MB_NO
WHERE SU_NO = #{suNo} AND SU_STATUS != 0

SELECT S.SU_NO, S.MB_NO, S.AS_NO, S.SU_MOTHER_NO, S.SU_INSERTDATE, S.SU_CONTENTS, M.MB_NICKNAME, M.MB_PHOTO FROM SUBMITTED_ASSIGNMENT S
JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MB_NO = M.MB_NO
WHERE S.SU_MOTHER_NO = #{suMotherNo} AND S.SU_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY S.SU_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUBMITTED_ASSIGNMENT S JOIN ASSIGNMENT AI ON S.AS_NO = AI.AS_NO JOIN ASSIGN A ON AI.GR_NO = A.GR_NO JOIN ASSIGNMENT_GROUP G ON AI.GR_NO = G.GR_NO WHERE A.MB_NO = #{mbNo} AND S.SU_STATUS = 1 AND G.ST_NO = #{stNo}
SELECT S.SU_NO, S.SU_MOTHER_NO, S.SU_CONTENTS FROM SUBMITTED_ASSIGNMENT S JOIN ASSIGNMENT A USING(AS_NO) JOIN ASSIGNMENT_GROUP G USING(GR_NO) WHERE ST_NO = #{stNo} AND SU_STATUS != 0

SELECT G.GR_NAME, AS_NO, A.AS_NAME, S.SU_NO, MB_NO, M.MB_NICKNAME, S.SU_INSERTDATE, S.SU_CONTENTS FROM SUBMITTED_ASSIGNMENT S JOIN ASSIGNMENT A USING(AS_NO) JOIN ASSIGNMENT_GROUP G USING(GR_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING(MB_NO) WHERE S.SU_STATUS != 0 AND S.SU_MOTHER_NO IS NULL AND G.ST_NO = #{stNo}

SELECT G.GR_NAME, AS_NO, A.AS_NAME, S.SU_NO, MB_NO, M.MB_NICKNAME, S.SU_INSERTDATE, S.SU_CONTENTS FROM SUBMITTED_ASSIGNMENT S JOIN ASSIGNMENT A USING(AS_NO) JOIN ASSIGNMENT_GROUP G USING(GR_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING(MB_NO) WHERE S.SU_STATUS != 0 AND S.SU_MOTHER_NO IS NULL AND G.ST_NO = #{stNo} AND MB_NO = #{mbNo}
